select
from acl_user_role ur join acl_role_permission rp on ur.role_id=rp.role_id join acl_permission p on p.id=rp.permission_id where ur.user_id=#{userId} and ur.is_deleted = 0 and rp.is_deleted = 0 and p.is_deleted = 0

select p.permission_value from acl_user_role ur join acl_role_permission rp on ur.role_id=rp.role_id join acl_permission p on p.id=rp.permission_id where ur.user_id=#{userId} and p.type = 2 and ur.is_deleted = 0 and rp.is_deleted = 0 and p.is_deleted = 0
